title: Pont des Arts - Wikipedia
body: The Pont des Arts (French pronunciation: [pɔ̃ dez‿aʁ]) or Passerelle des Arts ([pasʁɛl-]) is a pedestrian bridge in Paris which crosses the River Seine. It links the Institut de France and the central square ( cour carrée ) of the Palais du Louvre , (which had been termed the "Palais des Arts" under the First French Empire ).
